clients.name: AstraZeneca
clients.details: AstraZeneca is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical business and our innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide.

clients.name: Exelixis
clients.details: We drive to deliver results and new medicines to treat and defeat cancer, giving patients hope for the future. Cancer is our cause.

clients.name: FerGene
clients.details: FerGene is a gene therapy company that is committed to revolutionizing the treatment of bladder cancer and better the life of patients.

clients.name: Janssen
clients.details: We believe challenging something is the best way to change it. Thatâ€™s why, in over 150 countries, we bring together the most creative minds and cutting-edge technology to help treat, cure, stop, and prevent some of the most complex diseases of our time.

clients.name: Legend Biotech
clients.details: Dedicated to quality and driven by excellence, we are committed to improving the lives of patients worldwide. We are steadfast in our goal to develop innovative cellular therapies that bring us closer to a cure.

clients.name: Novartis
clients.details: Novartis is a global healthcare company based in Switzerland that provides solutions to address the evolving needs of patients worldwide.

clients.name: Pfizer
clients.details: Pfizer Inc. is an American multinational pharmaceutical corporation. It is one of the world's largest pharmaceutical companies and ranked 57 on the 2018 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.

clients.name: Pierre Fabre
clients.details: Work for Pierre Fabre, be true to your nature We develop tomorrow's prescription drugs and products with the inexhaustible resources of our imagination. There is no task more exciting than this!
